original_text:
You went out for the salvation of your people,
    for the salvation of your anointed.
You crushed the head of the house of the wicked,
    laying him bare from thigh to neck. Selah
korean_text: 주께서 주의 백성을 구원하시려고, 기름 부음 받은 자를 구원하시려고 나오사 악인의 집의 머리를 치시며 그 기초를 바닥까지 드러내셨나이다 (셀라)

sentences.original_text: You went out for the salvation of your people
for the salvation of your anointed.
sentences.korean_translation: 주의 기름 부음 받은 자를 구원하려 하심이라

sentences.original_text: You crushed the head of the house of the wicked
laying him bare from thigh to neck.
